channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: L’IA clone la voix des commentateurs pour PSG-OM : une première mondiale ce soir
item.description: Grande première ce soir pour le Trophée des Champions à Koweït City. La LFP teste une IA capable de traduire les commentaires en italien tout en clonant la voix des journalistes français.

item.title: Boulanger solde à -30 % ce TV Mini LED ultra lumineux (165 Hz) noté 9/10 par nos soins
item.description: Le téléviseur Hisense 55U8Q est un modèle haut de gamme réputé pour sa luminosité record avec ses Mini-LED, à retrouver pour 699 euros au lieu de 999 euros sur Boulanger.

item.title: DJI Avata 360 leak shows versatile drone could beat Insta360 with one unique feature
item.description: We have more pictures of the DJI Avata 360, and it looks as though it's ready to take on the Antigravity A1.

item.title: I love the new Philips Hue Essential smart bulbs, but how do the new Lifx Everyday lights compare?
item.description: Lifx has followed in Hue's footsteps with a new line of cheap and very cheerful bulbs, but which ones should be brightening your home?

item.title: Sony unveiled a new 'HyperPop' accessory collection — but it's absolutely hideous
item.description: Sony has just revealed some seriously ugly new DualSense Wireless Controllers and PS5 console covers.

item.title: 'Deliciously bonkers' or 'Too grim to be fun'? New Netflix show His & Hers divides critics — but they all love its wild ending
item.description: His & Hers is a new Netflix murder-mystery show that's already drawing attention for its shocking ending.

item.title: Google Messages : cette nouveauté va enfin soulager vos pouces
item.description: Les adeptes de grands écrans vont bientôt pouvoir reposer leurs mains. Google Messages simplifie son interface pour s’utiliser à une main.

item.title: Creatine Supplements Are Everywhere. Do I Need Them? (2026)
item.description: It's the most studied supplement in sports medicine, but it's not just for athletes anymore.

item.title: WhatsApp is getting one of its best upgrades in years — here are 3 new ways to supercharge your group chats
item.description: These new WhatsApp tools are coming to group chats — and I can't wait to get my hands on the new text sticker feature.

item.title: Grab the classic Kindle for its best price since Black Friday on Amazon
item.description: Missed out on the deals over Black Friday? The Amazon Kindle is on sale again in the January sales at Amazon for a great low price.

item.title: Anker is putting screens on its latest smart chargers – and the idea is dividing opinion
item.description: The new Anker Nano Charger can recognize what it's plugged into, has a built-in screen, and delivers 45W of power.

item.title: Répéter le même mouvement des centaines de fois : en Chine, ces travailleurs « forment » les robots humanoïdes
item.description: Des centaines de « cyber-travailleurs » entraîneraient, en Chine, des robots humanoïdes à exécuter des gestes manuels. Dans le pays, 40 « usines de données pour humanoïdes » ont été financées par Pékin.

item.title: The Lego Disney and Pixar ‘Up’ House has been marked down to under $40 at Amazon — save $22
item.description: As of Jan. 8, the Lego Disney and Pixar ‘Up’ House is on sale at Amazon for $37.99, a 37% discount from its list price of $59.99.

item.title: Both Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Elite Trainer Boxes are now around market price at Amazon
item.description: Both Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution Elite Trainer Boxes are now priced closer to market value at Amazon, with the Mega Gardevoir ETB dropping below $100.

item.title: ‘Starfleet Academy’ Is a Solid Successor to the ‘Star Trek’ Legacy
item.description: 'Starfleet Academy' follows on in the style of 'Discovery,' for better and occasionally worse—but builds something interesting of its own out of inheriting the legacy of 'Star Trek.'

item.title: Gizmodo’s Best of CES 2026 Awards: See the Winners
item.description: Here's all the tech that most impressed us at the 2026 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

item.title: 2026 Is the Year of the RGB LED TV
item.description: The crop of next-generation TVs arriving this year has more accurate colors than ever, thanks to a fancy new kind of backlighting.

item.title: The gap between premium and budget TV brands is quickly closing
item.description: For all the time that I've been covering technology, there's been a hierarchy when it comes to TV brands. The big three - Sony, Samsung, and LG - have been on top for a while. Pioneer and Panasonic were up there with plasma TVs, and Panasonic is getting back in the game in the States. […]

item.title: America’s new era of energy imperialism is about more than oil
item.description: President Donald Trump has no shame in admitting what he wants to get out of attacking Venezuela and threatening other energy resource-rich nations. "We're gonna get the oil flowing the way it should be," he said January 3rd, soon after his administration stunned the world with what many policy experts and Democratic lawmakers are calling […]

item.title: Disney+ is launching vertical videos this year
item.description: Disney+ will add vertical videos to its service in the US sometime this year, in hopes that they can entice viewers to engage with its app every day. The company has made the announcement at its Tech + Data Showcase event at CES 2026. Disney first dabbled in vertical content with Verts, which launched for the ESPN app in August 2025, giving it the insight it needed on how its users respond to the video format. Erin Teague, Disney Entertainment’s EVP of Product Management, told Deadline that the company will use the format for all kinds of content. The service isn’t just planning to use it as a...

item.title: Fujifilm’s new Super 8-style video camera is the weirdest Instax ever – but it could also be the most fun
item.description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini Evo Cinema is the oddest-looking Instax camera yet but it's likely to prove a huge hit with the younger, retro-loving generation

item.title: Apple AirPods Pro 3 are down to under $200 at Amazon — act fast to save
item.description: As of Jan. 8, the AirPods Pro 3 are marked down to $199.99 at Amazon. This is 20% off their list price of $249.

item.title: Ce puissant laptop HP de 16″ avec un Ryzen 7 et une RTX 5070 perd 30% de son prix pendant les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Une configuration forte à base de Ryzen AI 7, RTX 5070, 16 Go de RAM et 512 Go de stockage, le tout enfermé dans un châssis 16 pouces. Voilà le HP Omen 16-ap0038nf. Et pour les soldes d’hiver, la claque est aussi sur l’étiquette : de 1 703,99 € à 1 192,79 €.

item.title: LEGO Smart Brick : tout savoir sur la brique connectée qui révolutionne la construction
item.description: LEGO vient d'amorcer une véritable révolution. Une brique intelligente, bardée de capteurs et rechargeable sans fil, s'apprête à débarquer dans vos sets Star Wars et Pokémon. Sur le papier, c'est fascinant. Dans la réalité ? C'est complexe.

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: Microsoft could reportedly reveal new Xbox hardware in 2026, including next-gen controllers and the Xbox Elite Controller Series 3
item.description: A new report from Windows Central claims that Microsoft will launch new Xbox hardware this year, including the next-generation Xbox Wireless Controllers and "perhaps even other controller revisions".

item.title: Watch Sophie Turner dominate Jimmy Fallon in a thumb war
item.description: Sophie Turner appeared on "The Tonight Show" and beat Jimmy Fallon in a thumb war to show her new Lara Croft strength.

item.title: B&You frappe fort en 2026 : 80 Go en 5G et Perplexity offert dans un forfait à prix cassé [Sponso]
item.description: Grosse enveloppe de data, connexion ultra rapide en 5G, communications illimitées et même un abonnement d’un an à Perplexity : ce forfait B&You sans engagement dispose de prestations XXL pour un prix riquiqui.

item.title: The Daring Attempt to End the Memory Shortage Crisis
item.description: The supply shortage of the RAM needed to build phones and PCs isn’t going away. But a few companies have a plan to solve it.

item.title: À 1500 dollars, le Motorola Razr Fold serait le smarphone pliable le moins cher du marché
item.description: Alors que Motorola a officiellement présenté son Razr Fold lors du CES 2026, le constructeur est resté très discret sur son prix. C'est Evan Blass qui lance un premier tarif et il serait particulièrement agressif, plaçant ce Fold bien en dessous des tarifs pratiqués par Samsung et Google sur ce segment.

item.title: Spotify Smart Shuffle played a song Id never heard before. It was AI generated.
item.description: Spotify's Smart Shuffle is recommending AI artists in listeners' queues, raising questions: do we need clearer AI labelling and options to opt out of AI music entirely?

item.title: Skullcandy's new earbuds put AI in your ears –but there's a catch
item.description: Skull AI comes out of beta to bring AI, exclusively to your 540 ANC earbuds

item.title: Free Mobile : si vous avez le forfait à 2 €, attention au nouveau répondeur
item.description: Free Mobile veut simplifier la vie de ses abonnés en activant d'office la Messagerie Vocale Visuelle (MVV). Plus besoin de composer le 666 pour écouter vos messages, ils s'affichent désormais directement sur votre smartphone.

item.title: Boulanger brade un tas de produit Tech durant les soldes d’hiver : voici le TOP 15 des deals à saisir
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver 2026 viennent tout juste de commencer, donnant une excellente opportunité d'optimiser ses achats Tech. Pour bien entamer l’année, le site Boulanger déploie une série de remises attractives sur une large gamme de produits. Découvrez en temps réel notre sélection des meilleures offres à ne pas manquer.

item.title: ChatGPT Health is a new space for medical questions that works with your health data — but OpenAI insists it's not designed to replace your doctor
item.description: ChatGPT Health is a new space for medical questions — and it works with your health records and apps, but OpenAI isn’t claiming it can replace your doctor.

item.title: The Pokémon TCGs Mega Charizard X ex Ultra-Premium Collection is under $170 at Amazon
item.description: You can now get the Pokemon TCG's Mega Charizard X ex Ultra Premium Collection for as low as $175.98.

item.title: Amazon frappe fort pour le début des soldes d’hiver : les 8 deals Tech à retenir
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver viennent de débuter, et si Amazon n'indique pas clairement sa participation à l'événement, de nombreux produits Tech se trouvent à prix cassés chez le géant du e-commerce. L’occasion parfaite de s’équiper malin pour bien démarrer l'année 2026.

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Grâce aux Soldes, ce laptop Lenovo avec écran OLED 3K tactile et Snapdragon X Elite est bradé à -40%
item.description: Le Lenovo Yoga Slim 7x est un ultrabook premium puissant avec une architecture ARM Snapdragon X Elite. Pendant les Soldes d'hiver 2026, il passe de 1 529,99 euros à 917,99 euros.

item.title: Warner Bros dit non à Paramount, l’accord avec Netflix tient bon
item.description: Netflix reste le favori pour le rachat de Warner Bros Discovery. Malgré la contre-offre plus élevée de Paramount, le conseil d'administration a voté en faveur du leader de la VOD. Paramount semble être définitivement hors course.

item.title: Disney+ change radicalement avec nouveau flux inspiré de TikTok qui va bouleverser l’application
item.description: Un flux de vidéos verticales personnalisé fera bientôt son apparition sur la plateforme de streaming.

item.title: A critical n8n flaw has been discovered - here's how to stay safe
item.description: A patch and workarounds are available.

item.title: True Patriots Are Cashing In on the Apocalypse
item.description: How two big names in mainstream disaster preparedness helped sell Americans on fear, anxiety and a new generator.

item.title: These are the risks and downsides of being a go-to person
item.description: It can lead to burnout and exhaustion. You’ve probably heard the saying, “If you need to get something done, give it to the busiest person you know.”

item.title: This cute soy sauce pouch could get rid of plastic packets for good
item.description: The Holy Carp soy sauce dropper fully composts after four to six weeks. Single-use soy sauce packets for sushi take-out orders are now a whole lot more sustainable, thanks to a redesign that doesn’t use any plastic.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel responds to Trump saying hes blinking not sleeping during meetings
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has responded to Trump claiming that he's not sleeping, but "blinking", in meetings with a montage.

item.title: Adieu le bruit : cette technologie s’apprête à supprimer définitivement les ventilateurs de nos PC portables
item.description: Et si nos PC du futur n'étaient plus équipés de ventilateurs mécaniques ? C'est l'idée derrière la technologie de YPlasma, qui se base sur des actionneurs à plasma pour refroidir les composants. On vous explique tout ça.

item.title: Galaxy Ring coincée au doigt : après des mois d’enquête, Samsung lève le voile sur ce qui s’est vraiment passé
item.description: Il y a quelques mois, un vidéaste racontait avoir vu sa Galaxy Ring enfler au point de ne plus pouvoir la retirer. Après plusieurs mois d'enquête, Samsung se veut rassurant.

item.title: This pocket-sized Bluetooth speaker takes aim at the JBL Go 4 — but sadly, 3 key flaws hold it back
item.description: I reviewed a cheap alternative to JBL’s smallest Bluetooth speaker — is it worth buying?
